snippet: More than 150 houses and 2 churches were set on fire in a new display of religious intolerance as Pakistan is reeling from violent persecution against other minorities.
abstract: Enraged Muslim crowd attacks a Christian neighborhood in Lahore, Pakistan, setting fire to more than 150 houses and 2 churches; crowd was reacting to report that a Christian sanitation worker had blasphemed the Prophet Muhammad;  in Peshawar, a bomb explodes in a mosque, killing at least 4 people and wounding 28.

byline.original: By DECLAN WALSH and WAQAR GILLANI
byline.contributor: Declan Walsh reported from Islamabad, and Waqar Gillani from Lahore, Pakistan. Ismail Khan contributed reporting from Peshawar, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: More than 150 houses and 2 churches were set on fire in a new display of religious intolerance as Pakistan is reeling from violent persecution against other minorities.

headline.seo: Muslim Mob Attacks Christian Area of Pakistan
headline.main: Attack on Christians Follows Claim of Blasphemy in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Attack on Christians Follows Claim of Blasphemy in Pakistan
